resources.string: This app captures certain data pertaining to the current Covid-19 situation in India. The condition of India as a whole is captured in the India fragment/page, whereas the details pertaining to the condition in each state is captured in the State fragment/page.\n\n We have displayed the confirmed, active, deceased and recovered cases. They are colour coded in the following order: red, blue, grey and green. In the states fragment all the districts are grouped by their state name. Additionally, we have added a search feature for the 2 fragments available
